name: github-trending-monorepo
description: Workspace housing the shared GitHub trending core, file backend, and Firebase backend.

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:firebase
scripts.start:file: npm run build:core && npm --workspace @github-trending/backend-file run start --
scripts.dev:file: npm run build:core && npm --workspace @github-trending/backend-file run dev --
